        </gmd:CI_Citation>             </gmd:citation>             <gmd:abstract>                 <gco:CharacterString>The Global Database of Events, Language, and Tone (GDELT Project) monitors the world's broadcast, print, and web news from nearly every corner of every country in over 100 languages and identifies the people, locations, organizations, counts, themes, sources, and events driving our global society every second of every day, creating a free open platform for computing on the entire world.</gco:CharacterString>             </gmd:abstract>             <gmd:purpose>
